mapper.select: SELECT PA.PARENT_NAME, RE.REVIEW_NUMBER, RE.REVIEW_CONTENT, RE.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, RE.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, RE.PARENT_NUMBER, RE.CLASS_NUMBER, RE.CLASS_NAME FROM( SELECT R.REVIEW_NUMBER, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, R.REVIEW_REGISTER_DATE, R.REVIEW_UPDATE_DATE, R.PARENT_NUMBER, R.CLASS_NUMBER, DETAIL.CLASS_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM PRO P JOIN CLASS C ON P.PRO_NUMBER = C.PRO_NUMBER AND P.PRO_NUMBER = #{proNumber} ) DETAIL JOIN REVIEW R ON DETAIL.CLASS_NUMBER = R.CLASS_NUMBER ) RE JOIN PARENT PA ON RE.PARENT_NUMBER = PA.PARENT_NUMBER
